tool_description: API that provides administrative structure of Rwanda like provinces, districts, sectors, cells and villages
name: rwanda
title: rwanda

api_list.name: All locations
api_list.description: All provinces, districts, sectors,cells and villages from Rwanda
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://rwanda.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rwanda.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Provinces
api_list.description: This endpoint retrieves all provinces found in Rwanda
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://rwanda.p.rapidapi.com/provinces"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rwanda.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://rwanda.p.rapidapi.com/provinces"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rwanda.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Districts
api_list.description: This endpoint retrieves all districts found in a specific province in Rwanda.  If no province provided it will return all districts in Rwanda.

api_list.name: Cells
api_list.description: This endpoint retrieves all cells found in a specific province, district, and sector. If no province, district, and sector provided it will return all cells in Rwanda.

api_list.name: Sectors
api_list.description: This endpoint retrieves all sectors found in specific district and province. If no province, and district provided it will return all sectors in Rwanda.

api_list.name: Villages
api_list.description: This endpoint retrieves all villages found in a specific province, district, sector, and cells. If no province, district, sector, and cell provided it will return all villages in Rwanda.
